# Robert Award for Best Actor in a Leading Television Role

The Robert Award for Best Actor in a Leading Television Role () is one of the merit awards presented by the Danish Film Academy at the annual Robert Awards ceremony. The award has been handed out since 2013.
Honorees
2010s
* 2013: Nikolaj Lie Kaas – Forbrydelsen 3
* 2014: Kim Bodnia – Broen II
* 2015: Carsten Bjørnlund – The Legacy
